questions.question_text: Which statements about the firmware upgrade process on an active-active HA cluster are true? (Choose two.)

choices.D: Traffic load balancing is temporally disabled while upgrading the firmware.
choices.C: Uninterruptable upgrade is enabled by default.
choices.A: The firmware image must be manually uploaded to each FortiGate.
choices.B: Only secondary FortiGate devices are rebooted.

discussion.content: The answers are C and D. FortiGate_Infrastructure_6.2_Study_Guide-Online (Page 327).

choices.B: ADVPN is only supported with IKEv2.
choices.D: Every spoke requires a static tunnel to be configured to other spokes so that phase 1 and phase 2 proposals are defined in advance.
